item.description:
Ok, I joined this group hoping that I would come across some people who appreciates the same kind of music I do and would like to go to concerts as well but haven't seen much activity here!

So, here it goes: 3 super awesome bands in one concert :D I haven't bought tickets yet but if we do get a group, we could coordinate and try to buy it together!

Tickets go from $65-$132 >>> I'm thinking about ~ $80-100?

We can carpool as well!
item.name: Def Leppard, Poison, Lita Ford
